title: Couple Day-Long package
description: Make a day more than a day at La Riveria Resort & Park! La Riveria Resort is designed to provide a unique riverside experience to Dhaka.We are located just 5 min away from Kancon Bridge, Purbachol. The closest resort to Dhaka. Our goal is to provide a place to relax in the city with their family. Our kitchen is equipped with modern amenities that serve exotic continental dishes. Time: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM Child Policy:(0-5) years old (only food cost if needed) (6-10) years old, BDT 1,800/- Above 10 years full charge.

title: Couple Night Stay Package
description: La Riveria offers a “Night Stay Package” ideally suited for a couple to enjoy their precious moments. This package includes Evening Snacks, Dinner, and Breakfast with Room. Child Policy: (0-5) years old (only food cost if needed) (6-10) years old, Night stay package- BDT 2,000/- Above 10 years full charge. Check-In Time 6.00 PM Check Out Time 9.30 AM

title: 22 Hours Couple Package
description: La Riveria offers a “22 Hours Package” ideal for couples to enjoy their precious moments. This package includes Lunch, Evening Snacks, Dinner, and Breakfast With Room. Child Policy:(0-5) years old (only food cost if needed) (6-10) years old, BDT 2,800/- Above 10 years full charge. Check-In Time is 10.00 AM and Check Out Time is 9.30 AM on the next day.

title: Wedding package
description: Make a day more than a day at La Riveria Resort & Park for wedding or any kind of event!To aquire this package you need to have at least a group of 1000 people.
